EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.London Date Change
EmailTemplate.subject: Date Change for SpringOne Tour London
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you at SpringOne Tour London in June. We wanted to give you notice that due to the popularity of the event, moved to a larger space.In order to accommodate this change, we had to push the dates to later in the week.
Please note that SpringOne Tour London will now be on June 21-22. If this is an issue and you can no longer attend, please email springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> and we will process a refund for you. Also, if this means your colleagues and friends can now attend, please invite them to register here <[[http://springonetour.io/2018/london]]> as well.
Let us know if you have any other questions and thanks for being flexible!
Sincerely, The SpringOne Tour Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[https://pivotal.io/]]>Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/subscription-management.html]]>.
